  • Field Details

    • appointmentList

      private List appointmentList

  • Constructor Details

    • Scheduler

      public Scheduler()
      Constructor to initialize a Scheduler object with an empty appointment list.

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Runs the scheduler, continuously accepting and processing user commands until the 'Q' command is entered. Commands include scheduling, canceling, rescheduling, and printing appointments or billing statements.

    • scheduleAppointment

      private void scheduleAppointment(String[] tokens)
      Schedules an appointment based on input tokens. Validates the appointment date, provider, and time slot before adding it to the appointment list.
      Parameters:
      tokens - The input data for the appointment to be scheduled.

    • isSameDay

      private static boolean isSameDay(Calendar cal1, Calendar cal2)

    • cancelAppointment

      private void cancelAppointment(String[] tokens)
      Cancels an existing appointment based on input tokens.
      Parameters:
      tokens - The input data identifying the appointment to be canceled.

    • rescheduleAppointment

      private void rescheduleAppointment(String[] tokens)
      Reschedules an existing appointment to a new time slot based on input tokens.
      Parameters:
      tokens - The input data identifying the appointment to be rescheduled.

    • isValidAppointment

      private boolean isValidAppointment(Date date, String timeSlot, String fname, String lname, Date dob, String providerLastName)
      Validates the appointment's date, time slot, patient details, and provider. Ensures that the date and provider are valid, and checks that the time slot is within the valid range.
      Parameters:
      date - The date of the appointment.
      timeSlot - The time slot of the appointment.
      fname - The first name of the patient.
      lname - The last name of the patient.
      dob - The date of birth of the patient.
      providerLastName - The last name of the provider.
      Returns:
      true if the appointment details are valid, false otherwise.

    • isValidProvider

      private boolean isValidProvider(String providerLastName)
      Validates if the provider's last name corresponds to a valid provider in the system.
      Parameters:
      providerLastName - The last name of the provider.
      Returns:
      true if the provider exists, false otherwise.

    • findAppointment

      private Appointment findAppointment(Date date, String timeSlot, String fname, String lname, Date dob)
      Finds an appointment based on the input data for date, time slot, patient name, and date of birth. Searches through the appointment list to find a matching appointment.
      Parameters:
      date - The date of the appointment.
      timeSlot - The time slot of the appointment.
      fname - The first name of the patient.
      lname - The last name of the patient.
      dob - The date of birth of the patient.
      Returns:
      The Appointment object if found, or null if not found.

    • isValidTimeSlot

      private boolean isValidTimeSlot(String timeSlot)
      Validates if the time slot provided is within the valid range of time slots.
      Parameters:
      timeSlot - The time slot to validate.
      Returns:
      true if the time slot is valid, false otherwise.

    • printBillingStatements

      private void printBillingStatements()
      Prints billing statements for all patients, sorted by patient. Displays the total amount due for each patient based on the specialty of their provider.

    • calculateCharge

      private int calculateCharge(Specialty specialty)
      Calculates the charge for a given specialty. The charge is determined by the specialty of the provider.
      Parameters:
      specialty - The specialty of the provider.
      Returns:
      The charge amount based on the specialty.
